welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kagoshima, Japan! Known for its stunning views of Sakurajima volcano and rich history, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful time here!

restaurants.name: Menfu Vagabond (麺歩バガボンド)
restaurants.description: Menfu Vagabond (麺歩バガボンド) is a ramen restaurant located in 鹿児島市.
restaurants.address: 山下町12-27, 鹿児島市, 鹿児島県, 892-0816

restaurants.name: いちにぃさん 天文館店
restaurants.description: いちにぃさん 天文館店 is a japanese restaurant located in 鹿児島市.
restaurants.address: 東千石町11-6 (天文館そばビル 2F), 鹿児島市, 鹿児島県, 892-0842

restaurants.name: 山形屋食堂

restaurants.address: 金生町3-1 (山形屋1号館 7F), 鹿児島市, 鹿児島県, 892-0828

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kagoshima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kagoshima Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
